body:
Hello.

I have a issues. Does anybody know. why i'm having this problem?

replies.body:
Hi Starsk,

I replied on github page: [https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/101](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/Honeybee/issues/101)

Let's keep questions related to energy simulation components to github until we officially release them.

Thanks,

Mostapha
